hadiths.text: Anas said:"A Bedouin came to the Masjid and urinated, and the people yelled at him, but the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Leave him alone.' So they left him alone. When he had finished urinating, he ordered that a bucket (be brought) and poured over it

chapter.eng-name: Leaving Any Restriction On The Amount Of Water
